original: de la man ngag gi 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la man ngag gi 'di lta ste /
translated: The intimate instruction is as follows:

analyzed: ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas byugs pa'i gsang ba'i phyogs la tsandan dang gur kun la sogs pa rnam par bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i sa bon gyis sngags btab pa'i rdo rgyus kyis re'u mig bcu gnyis pa 'khor lo mngon par
translated: In a secret place smeared with cow dung and cow dung, on a ma·πá·∏çala of camphor, saffron, and so on, with a chalk line enchanted with the mantra of the five dakini seed syllables, draw a twelve-part grid.

original: bris te / de la shar gyi re'u mig nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: bris te / de la shar gyi re'u mig nas brtsams nas /
translated: Having written it, beginning from the eastern square,

original: yi ge aa la sogs pa yi ge aa'i mthar thug pa rnams ma ning gi yi ge ri r'i li l'i spangs nas bri bar byas te /
analyzed: yi ge aa la sogs pa yi ge aa'i mthar thug pa rnams ma ning gi yi ge ri r'i li l'i spangs nas bri bar byas te /
translated: one should write the letters beginning with a and ending with ƒÅ, excluding the neutral letters ri, ri, li, and li.

original: bdag kyang yi dam gyi lha yid @5a * //
analyzed: bdag kyang yi dam gyi lha yid @5a * //
translated: One should also visualize one's chosen deity.

original: la byed pa byas pa de'i 'dri ba po'i ngag gi dbang phyug tshad bzung nas de'i grangs su gsungs pa dang / 'khor lo'i yi ge yang bzung nas de'i grangs de yang sum 'gyur du byas te /
analyzed: la byed pa byas pa de'i 'dri ba po'i ngag gi dbang phyug tshad bzung nas de'i grangs su gsungs pa dang / 'khor lo'i yi ge yang bzung nas de'i grangs de yang sum 'gyur du byas te /
translated: Having counted the number of syllables of the questioner's speech, one should speak that number, and also having counted the wheel letters, one should triple that number.

original: rtsis de yang drug 'gyur du byas nas //
analyzed: rtsis de yang drug 'gyur du byas nas //
translated: One should also make that calculation six times.

original: de kho na la drug cu rtsa lngas bsres te /
analyzed: de kho na la drug cu rtsa lngas bsres te /
translated: One should mix that with sixty-five.

original: de las bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su phri nas lus pa'i rtsis kyi tshad gang de'i yon tan bltas nas dge dang mi dge ba bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su phri nas lus pa'i rtsis kyi tshad gang de'i yon tan bltas nas dge dang mi dge ba bstan par bya'o //
translated: Having subtracted twelve from that twelve times, one should examine the remaining number of calculations and teach the virtues and non-virtues.

original: ma ning gnyis ni mngon spangs te //
analyzed: ma ning gnyis ni mngon spangs te //
translated: The two neutral ones are excluded.

original: zhes ni ri r'i dang li l'i spangs pa'i sgra yig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes ni ri r'i dang li l'i spangs pa'i sgra yig ces pa'i don to //
translated: This means excluding the neutral letters ri, ri, li, and li.

original: aa zhes bya bar rim ldan na //
analyzed: aa zhes bya bar rim ldan na //
translated: If one is in the order of a,

original: zhes pa dang po nas gzung ste //
analyzed: zhes pa dang po nas gzung ste //
translated: Beginning from the first,

original: ji ltar dang po aa zhes pas //
analyzed: ji ltar dang po aa zhes pas //
translated: Just as the first is a,

original: de bzhin mtha' ma gzung bar bya //
analyzed: de bzhin mtha' ma gzung bar bya //
translated: So the last should be taken.

original: zhes ji snyed kyi bar mtshan ma'i yon tan gsungs so //üîΩda ni / ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung na //
analyzed: zhes ji snyed kyi bar mtshan ma'i yon tan gsungs so // da ni / ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung na //
translated: Thus, the qualities of the sign are taught up to just so many.

original: zhes pa de la man ngag ston pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa de la man ngag ston pa ni //
translated: Now, the instruction on that which is said, Having taken up the lord of speech,

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kho nas gsung bar mdzad pas gsungs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kho nas gsung bar mdzad pas gsungs pa //
translated: is taught by the BhagavƒÅn himself.

original: gong du sum 'gyur bya ba dang ; zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gong du sum 'gyur bya ba dang ; zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, The above is tripled, and so on.

original: de la / gong du sum 'gyur bya ba dad //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: de la / gong du sum 'gyur bya ba dad // zhes pa ni /
translated: There, The above is tripled

original: 'dri mkhan gyi ngag gi dbang phyug rnams ni dang po sum 'gyur du byas nas phyi nas drug 'gyur bya'o zhes don gsungs pa //
analyzed: 'dri mkhan gyi ngag gi dbang phyug rnams ni dang po sum 'gyur du byas nas phyi nas drug 'gyur bya'o zhes don gsungs pa //
translated: means that the lords of speech who are the questioners should first triple it and then make it sixfold.

original: drug 'gyur du ni brtsi ba gzhag / ces pa ste /
analyzed: drug 'gyur du ni brtsi ba gzhag / ces pa ste /
translated: The meaning is stated: The calculation as sixfold is set aside.

original: don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows:

original: 'dri mkhan gyi ngag gi dbang phyug sum 'gyur du byas pa kho na ji snyed kyi sgra yig de snyed kyi tshad kho na yang drug 'gyur du gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dri mkhan gyi ngag gi dbang phyug sum 'gyur du byas pa kho na ji snyed kyi sgra yig de snyed kyi tshad kho na yang drug 'gyur du gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The number of syllables in the questioner's name multiplied by three is the number of syllables in the answer.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: drug cu rtsa lngas bsres nas ni //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa lngas bsres nas ni //
translated: Mixed with sixty-five,

original: zhes pa ni drug 'gyur du byas pa'i tshad kho na la drug cu rtsa lngas bsres nas gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni drug 'gyur du byas pa'i tshad kho na la drug cu rtsa lngas bsres nas gcig tu byas te /
translated: means that the number of syllables in the answer, multiplied by six, is mixed with sixty-five and made into one.

original: sa yis de ni bcad nas su //
analyzed: sa yis de ni bcad nas su //
translated: Cut by the earth,

original: zhes pa ste bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su bcad nas phri bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ste bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su bcad nas phri bar byas pa'o //

original: yi ge lhag ma gzung byas te //
analyzed: yi ge lhag ma gzung byas te //
translated: The remaining letters are to be taken,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: bcu gnyis su phri ba las lhag pa'i yi ge rtsis kyis yi ge grangs kyis bgrangs pa'i yi ge'i yon tan dge mi dge lung du bstan par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis su phri ba las lhag pa'i yi ge rtsis kyis yi ge grangs kyis bgrangs pa'i yi ge'i yon tan dge mi dge lung du bstan par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
translated: that the qualities of the remaining letters, counted by the number of letters, are to be predicted as virtuous, non-virtuous, or neutral.

original: yang na ri mo kyag kyog ris //
analyzed: yang na ri mo kyag kyog ris //
translated: Or in a crooked line,üîΩ means

original: zhes pa la sogs pas ni yang dang yang du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa ste /üîΩ'di la kyag kyog ces pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas ni yang dang yang du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa ste / 'di la kyag kyog ces pa ni //
translated: Thus, the signs of virtue and nonvirtue are stated again and again in other ways.

original: glang gi gcin bzhin du 'dren par byed pa'i ri mo'o //
analyzed: glang gi gcin bzhin du 'dren par byed pa'i ri mo'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúzigzag‚Äù is a drawing that leads like an elephant‚Äôs urine.

original: de 'dra'i ri mo la sngon @5b gsungs pa'i 'du byed kyis gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ba'i sa la gang mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags btab pa rdo rgyus kyis mnyam por tshur 'dren nas bris te /
analyzed: de 'dra'i ri mo la sngon @5b gsungs pa'i 'du byed kyis gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ba'i sa la gang mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags btab pa rdo rgyus kyis mnyam por tshur 'dren nas bris te /
translated: On that drawing, the place that is purified by the previously described formative factors is drawn with a chalk powder that is enchanted with the dakini mantra.

original: de'i steng gi spyi bo la sgra yig bcu gnyis rnams bkod nas brtsis pa la tha mar gyur ba'i sgra yig gi yon tan brjod par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng gi spyi bo la sgra yig bcu gnyis rnams bkod nas brtsis pa la tha mar gyur ba'i sgra yig gi yon tan brjod par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
translated: The twelve vowels are placed on the top of that, and the quality of the last vowel that is counted is to be stated.

original: yang na me tog mar btang ste //
analyzed: yang na me tog mar btang ste //
translated: Alternatively, flowers are cast.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: gzhan yang mtshan ma brjod pa sbyor ba kho na gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtshan ma brjod pa sbyor ba kho na gsungs te /
translated: Moreover, the statement of the signs is stated only in the application.

original: de la man ngag ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la man ngag ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The instruction is as follows.

original: gong gi re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo ni gong nas gsungs pa'i rim pas mngon du bris te /üîΩde la yang ma ning gi yi ge spangs pa'i sgra yig bcu gnyis bkod nas rang gi yi dam gyi sems sngon du byas te /
analyzed: gong gi re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo ni gong nas gsungs pa'i rim pas mngon du bris te / de la yang ma ning gi yi ge spangs pa'i sgra yig bcu gnyis bkod nas rang gi yi dam gyi sems sngon du byas te /
translated: The wheel of the above twelfth square is written in the order stated above.

original: me tog mar btang bar bya'o //
analyzed: me tog mar btang bar bya'o //
translated: There, having arranged the twelve vowels excluding the neutral letters, one should cast the flower of one's chosen deity.

original: re'u mig la me tog lhung ba re'u mig de la gzhag pa'i sgra yig gi yon tan 'dri mkhan de la dag mi dge lung du bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: re'u mig la me tog lhung ba re'u mig de la gzhag pa'i sgra yig gi yon tan 'dri mkhan de la dag mi dge lung du bstan par bya'o //
translated: The square on which the flower falls is the quality of the vowel placed on that square, which is to be declared to the questioner.

original: de dag ni dpal ldan gdan bzhi pa las le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: de dag ni dpal ldan gdan bzhi pa las le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the first chapter of the glorious Catuspƒ´·π≠ha.

original: // / da ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma 'byung ba nges mtshan ma'i skyes bu bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dang / 'dri mkhan gyi gnas dang / dbugs kyi rnam pa'i cha dang / 'tsho ba dang / mi 'tsho ba dang / char 'bab pa'i sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: // / da ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma 'byung ba nges mtshan ma'i skyes bu bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dang / 'dri mkhan gyi gnas dang / dbugs kyi rnam pa'i cha dang / 'tsho ba dang / mi 'tsho ba dang / char 'bab pa'i sbyor ba dang /
translated: Now, the signs of the arising of untimely death, the application of protecting a person with signs, the place of the questioner, the aspect of the breath, life and non-life, and the application of rain,

original: pho nya'i mtshan ma rnams ston 'dod pas /
analyzed: pho nya'i mtshan ma rnams ston 'dod pas /
translated: The desire to show the signs of the messenger is expressed in the verse beginning The one who is desirous of the signs of the messenger.

original: ye shes de nyid bye brag dag / ces pa la sogs pas ni le'u gnyis pa brtsams so //
analyzed: ye shes de nyid bye brag dag / ces pa la sogs pas ni le'u gnyis pa brtsams so //
translated: The verse beginning That very wisdom, in particular was composed in the second chapter.

original: de la / ji ltar lus kyi mtshan ma dang // zhes pa ni skyes bu rnams kyi lus la rnam par gnas pa'i dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ci 'dra ga la gnas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la / ji ltar lus kyi mtshan ma dang // zhes pa ni skyes bu rnams kyi lus la rnam par gnas pa'i dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ci 'dra ga la gnas zhes pa'o //
translated: There, the line What are the signs of the body? asks, What are the signs of untimely death that abide in the bodies of people? Where do they abide?

original: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che //
analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che //
translated: Listen, great king!

original: zhes pa la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na slar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na slar gsungs pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning with these words expresses the BhagavƒÅn's restatement of reality.

original: dbugs ni rnam par rgod pa yis //üîΩlus can zla ba drug na 'chi //
analyzed: dbugs ni rnam par rgod pa yis // lus can zla ba drug na 'chi //
translated: The line The body with agitated breath

original: zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi mtshan nyid rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i grangs las phyin ci log par phri pa dang bskyed par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi mtshan nyid rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i grangs las phyin ci log par phri pa dang bskyed par 'jug pa'o //
translated: will die in six months means that the characteristics of the exhaled and inhaled breath are engaged in subtracting and adding in the opposite way from the enumeration taught.

original: lus kyis kyang bskyed pa dang phri bar 'byung ba dang / lus can rnams kyi lus ni shi ba zhes shing 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyis kyang bskyed pa dang phri bar 'byung ba dang / lus can rnams kyi lus ni shi ba zhes shing 'pho ba'o //
translated: The bodies of embodied beings are called dead and transferred.

original: de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na //
analyzed: de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na //
translated: Likewise, seeing small fear,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma gsungs so //
translated: and so on, it is said that there are other signs of untimely death.

original: don ni 'di lta ste /üîΩ'jigs pa chung zhes pa @6a * //
analyzed: don ni 'di lta ste / 'jigs pa chung zhes pa @6a * //
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: ni dus ma yin par shi ba mthong nas 'jigs pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ni dus ma yin par shi ba mthong nas 'jigs pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Seeing small fear means fear from seeing untimely death.

original: 'gram pa'i chogs ni g-yo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gram pa'i chogs ni g-yo bar 'gyur //
translated: The collection of cheeks moves.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is said.

original: gal te dus la bab 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te dus la bab 'gyur na //
translated: If the time comes,

original: dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur //
translated: the breath will be cut off and interrupted.

original: zhes pa ni dus la bab 'gyur zhes pa ni glo bur du 'chi ba'i sa la gal te rtsis kyis brtsis na /üîΩdbugs kyi tshad la chad cing /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dus la bab 'gyur zhes pa ni glo bur du 'chi ba'i sa la gal te rtsis kyis brtsis na / dbugs kyi tshad la chad cing /
translated: If the time comes means that if one calculates the time of sudden death,

original: 'chad 'gyur zhes bskyed pa dang phri ba yin no //
analyzed: 'chad 'gyur zhes bskyed pa dang phri ba yin no //
translated: the measure of the breath will be cut off and interrupted.

original: de tshe chad pa ni shi ba'o //
analyzed: de tshe chad pa ni shi ba'o //
translated: The cut off at that time is death.

original: de la yang chad pa'i rim pa yongs su shes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag ste /
analyzed: de la yang chad pa'i rim pa yongs su shes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag ste /
translated: Moreover, the complete knowledge of the sequence of the subtractions is the teacher's instruction.

original: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la mu khyud bcu gnyis pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / dbus kyi re'u mig sngon du bri ba'o //
analyzed: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la mu khyud bcu gnyis pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / dbus kyi re'u mig sngon du bri ba'o //
translated: One should make a twelve-square [grid] with twelve circles, and draw the central square first.

original: de la phyi'i tshad ni shar gyi re'u mig la tshad lnga'o //
analyzed: de la phyi'i tshad ni shar gyi re'u mig la tshad lnga'o //
translated: Therein, the external measure is that in the eastern square there are five squares,

original: rtsis yig lnga'o //
analyzed: rtsis yig lnga'o //
translated: five figures,

original: re'u mig gnyis pa la yang bcu'o //
analyzed: re'u mig gnyis pa la yang bcu'o //
translated: and ten in the second square.

original: re'u mig gsum pa la bco lnga'o //
analyzed: re'u mig gsum pa la bco lnga'o //
translated: There are fifteen in the third square,

original: re'u mig bzhi pa la nyi shu'o //
analyzed: re'u mig bzhi pa la nyi shu'o //
translated: twenty in the fourth square,

original: re'u mig lnga pa la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: re'u mig lnga pa la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: twenty-five in the fifth square,

original: re'u mig drug pa la nyi shu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: re'u mig drug pa la nyi shu rtsa drug go //
translated: twenty-six in the sixth square,

original: re'u mig brgyad pa la nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: re'u mig brgyad pa la nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: twenty-eight in the eighth square,

original: re'u mig dgu pa la nyi shu rtsa dgu'o //
analyzed: re'u mig dgu pa la nyi shu rtsa dgu'o //
translated: twenty-nine in the ninth square,

original: re'u mig bcu pa la sum cu tham pa'o //
analyzed: re'u mig bcu pa la sum cu tham pa'o //
translated: thirty in the tenth square,

original: re'u mig bcu gcig pa la sum cu rtsa gcig go /
analyzed: re'u mig bcu gcig pa la sum cu rtsa gcig go /
translated: thirty-one in the eleventh square,

original: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: and thirty-two in the twelfth square.

original: re'u mig dbus ma la sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
analyzed: re'u mig dbus ma la sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
translated: The middle square is the thirty-third.

original: de dag dbus kyi rim pa shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag dbus kyi rim pa shes par bya ba'o //
translated: This is the knowledge of the middle square.

original: yang bar gyi mu khyud la shar gyi re'u mig la lo gsum mo //
analyzed: yang bar gyi mu khyud la shar gyi re'u mig la lo gsum mo //
translated: Again, on the middle ring, the eastern square is three years.

original: gnyis pa la lo gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis pa la lo gnyis so //
translated: The second is two years.

original: gsum pa la lo gcig go //
analyzed: gsum pa la lo gcig go //
translated: The third is one year.

original: bzhi pa la zla ba drug go //
analyzed: bzhi pa la zla ba drug go //
translated: The fourth is six months.

original: lnga pa la zla ba gsum mo //
analyzed: lnga pa la zla ba gsum mo //
translated: The fifth is three months.

original: drug pa la zla ba gnyis so //
analyzed: drug pa la zla ba gnyis so //
translated: The sixth is two months.

original: bdun pa la zla ba gcig go //
analyzed: bdun pa la zla ba gcig go //
translated: The seventh is one month.

original: brgyad pa la zla ba phyed do //
analyzed: brgyad pa la zla ba phyed do //
translated: The eighth is a half month.

original: dgu pa la tshes bcu'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la tshes bcu'o //
translated: The ninth is ten days.

original: bcu pa la tshes lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la tshes lnga'o //
translated: The tenth is five days.

original: bcu gcig pa la tshes gsum mo //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la tshes gsum mo //
translated: The eleventh is three days.

original: bcu gnyis pa la tshes gnyis so //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la tshes gnyis so //
translated: The twelfth is two days.

original: dbu ma la tshes gcig go //
analyzed: dbu ma la tshes gcig go //
translated: The middle is one day.

original: de ltar 'tsho ba'i tshes grangs so //
analyzed: de ltar 'tsho ba'i tshes grangs so //
translated: This is the number of days of life.

original: de ltar yang smras pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang smras pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: de ltar dbugs chad pa dang / bskyed pa rnal 'byor pas dus gang la yongs su brtag par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar dbugs chad pa dang / bskyed pa rnal 'byor pas dus gang la yongs su brtag par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúAt what time should the yogin investigate the cessation and production of the breath?‚Äù it is said:

original: snga dro 'dzag pa'i dus la ni //
analyzed: snga dro 'dzag pa'i dus la ni //
translated: In the morning, the time of exhalation,

original: de la mtshan ma brtag par bya //
analyzed: de la mtshan ma brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine the signs there.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: Thus it is.

original: bsam pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows:

original: tho rangs 'dzag pa'i yan lag gi gnas skabs las yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: tho rangs 'dzag pa'i yan lag gi gnas skabs las yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: One should examine the condition of the nose-tip in the morning.

original: da ni yan lag brgyad la gnas pa chad par gyur @6b na ;
analyzed: da ni yan lag brgyad la gnas pa chad par gyur @6b na ;
translated: Now, the life-span of one who has lost the eight limbs is explained.

original: 'tsho ba'i tshes grangs kyi tshad gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i tshes grangs kyi tshad gsungs pa /
translated: The measure of the life-span is stated:

original: sna yi nang ka chad pa na //
analyzed: sna yi nang ka chad pa na //
translated: When the inner nostril is cut off,

original: nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za //

translated: The water offering is

analyzed: dbus su chu yi snod la sogs //

analyzed: de nas phyi rol gnas pa ni //

analyzed: chu'i las la sogs zhes pa ni //

analyzed: phyin nas bdag gi dbugs kyis gong nas gsungs pa'i bkod pa'i rim pas phyung nas phyi rol gyi gnas la chu'i dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma las kyi rim pas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan par bskyed nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i
translated: Having gone there, one should generate the gnosis ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´ in the middle of the water in the external place by the process of the stages of the creation stage, endowed with color, implements, and so on.üîΩ

original: sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: Having gone there, the yogin should generate the wisdom dakini in the middle of the water in the external place, with the color, implements, and so on, by the process of the rite, having extracted her with his breath, by the process of the arrangement taught above, and perform the burnt offerings of pacification and so on.

original: so sor rtogs ni brtan pa ni //
analyzed: so sor rtogs ni brtan pa ni //
translated: The individual realizations are the firm ones.

original: rang gi gzugs kyis kha dog ldan //
analyzed: rang gi gzugs kyis kha dog ldan //

original: dam tshig kun gyi phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: dam tshig kun gyi phyag rgya ni //

original: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs bstan //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs bstan //

original: zhas pa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la ston par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: zhas pa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la ston par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should display the vajra dakini and so on with the seal of the commitment of the wisdom dakini.

original: sngags pas rtag tu chu gtor na //
analyzed: sngags pas rtag tu chu gtor na //
translated: The mantra practitioner should always perform water offerings,

original: khyad par dag ni rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par dag ni rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: and the special ones will be expanded.

original: zhes pa ni mdun na bsgoms pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dbu rgyan gyi rdo rje rtse mor nyin re bzhin du chu gtor nas phul pas rgyas pa chen por skye ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mdun na bsgoms pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dbu rgyan gyi rdo rje rtse mor nyin re bzhin du chu gtor nas phul pas rgyas pa chen por skye ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that the vajra at the crown of the head of the Vajra dakini and so forth visualized in front, by offering the water oblation day after day, will greatly increase.

original: de dag ni dpal ldan gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa las gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: de dag ni dpal ldan gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa las gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
translated: These are the second chapter on the seat of others in the commentary on the glorious Four Seats.

original: // /'di ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba med par mchog gi dngos grub mi 'gyur pas /üîΩ'khor ba las brgal mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che //
analyzed: // /'di ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba med par mchog gi dngos grub mi 'gyur pas / 'khor ba las brgal mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che //
translated: Thus, for the yogi who meditates in this way, without drawing the mandala, the supreme attainment will not occur.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi le'u brtsams so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi le'u brtsams so //
translated: Therefore, the chapter on the mandala is composed beginning with Listen, O King, great vajra, to the characteristics of transcending cyclic existence.

original: phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams rang bzhin med pa ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u bshad zin pas na 'dir ma bkrol lo //
analyzed: phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams rang bzhin med pa ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u bshad zin pas na 'dir ma bkrol lo //
translated: Since the explanation of the chapter on emptiness has already explained that the aggregates and so forth are essenceless, it is not elaborated here.

original: ji ltar mnyam par blta ba dang // zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mnyam par blta ba dang // zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The chapter on the view of equality is composed beginning with How to view equality, and so forth, which are easy to understand.

original: gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig rdo rje de kho na //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig rdo rje de kho na //
translated: listen, O Vajra, to that!

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dngos po rnam par dag pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dngos po rnam par dag pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, and so forth, it is said that things are pure.

original: bla med nyid du bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bla med nyid du bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to make it unsurpassed,

original: thal sbyar 'di gsum brjod par bya //
analyzed: thal sbyar 'di gsum brjod par bya //
translated: one should utter these three times.

original: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bskyed nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bskyed nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that, having generated the thought of enlightenment, one should make the unsurpassed offering to the Buddha.

original: h'um zhes bya ba la sbyor ba //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba la sbyor ba //
translated: One should apply the syllable HUM,

original: phyag 'tshal 'joms pa mthar gzhag ste //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal 'joms pa mthar gzhag ste //

original: zhes pa ni /üîΩde la / h'um zhes bya ba @17a * //üîΩrab sbyor ba //
analyzed: zhes pa ni / de la / h'um zhes bya ba @17a * // rab sbyor ba //
translated: thusüîΩone should apply the syllable HUM

original: zhes pa ni phyag 'tshal dang 'joms pa gnyis kyi bar du yi ge h'um sbyor bar bya'o zhes pa ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyag 'tshal dang 'joms pa gnyis kyi bar du yi ge h'um sbyor bar bya'o zhes pa ji snyed pa'o //
translated: between the bowing down and the destroying.

original: de ltar zin ma thag tu /
analyzed: de ltar zin ma thag tu /
translated: Thus, immediately after the completion of the mantra,

original: aom h'um phat ces pa'i sngags su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom h'um phat ces pa'i sngags su 'gyur ro //
translated: the mantra O'M HUM PHAT comes forth.

original: sngags des rang gi lag pa rdo rjer bsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su brtag par byas nas sa sbyang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sngags des rang gi lag pa rdo rjer bsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su brtag par byas nas sa sbyang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Having imagined one's hand to be a vajra by that mantra, having examined the places of the five Tathagatas, one should purify the ground.

original: de nas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dris gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor byas te /
analyzed: de nas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dris gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor byas te /
translated: Then, having made a square mandala with very fragrant scent,

original: rdul tshon lngas padma 'dab ma brgyad bris te /
analyzed: rdul tshon lngas padma 'dab ma brgyad bris te /
translated: having drawn an eight-petaled lotus with five-colored powders,

original: de'i dbus su dngos grub thams cad kyi bum pa dang / shar gyi 'dab ma la tshon sna lnga'i thig le dang / lho'i 'dab ma la rdo rje dang / byang gi 'dab ma la dril bu dang / nub kyi 'dab ma la bdud rtsis gang ba'i dung chen po la sogs pa'i snod rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bris te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su dngos grub thams cad kyi bum pa dang / shar gyi 'dab ma la tshon sna lnga'i thig le dang / lho'i 'dab ma la rdo rje dang / byang gi 'dab ma la dril bu dang / nub kyi 'dab ma la bdud rtsis gang ba'i dung chen po la sogs pa'i snod rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bris te /
translated: in its center a vase of all powers, in the eastern petal a five-colored drop, in the southern petal a vajra, in the northern petal a bell, and in the western petal a vessel filled with nectar, such as a great conch, having drawn the mandalas of those,

original: skud pa dmar pos de'i glor kun yongs su dkris nas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: skud pa dmar pos de'i glor kun yongs su dkris nas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: having completely wrapped them with red thread, one should place them.

original: de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i nga rgyal gyis me tog dang / dri dang / spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / lha bshos dang / gtor ma dang / nye bar spyod pa la sogs pas mchod pa rnams bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i nga rgyal gyis me tog dang / dri dang / spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / lha bshos dang / gtor ma dang / nye bar spyod pa la sogs pas mchod pa rnams bya'o //
translated: incense, perfume, flower garlands, food, sacrificial cakes, and articles of daily use.

original: de'i 'og tu yang lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yang lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
translated: Then, with both hands, make a vajra fist

original: sna'i rtse la phyin ci log nas bzhag ste /
analyzed: sna'i rtse la phyin ci log nas bzhag ste /
translated: and place it upside down at the tip of the nose.

original: phyogs su brkyang nas bgegs rnams sngags 'dis gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs su brkyang nas bgegs rnams sngags 'dis gzhom par bya'o //
translated: Stretching it out in the direction, one should destroy the obstructors with this mantra.

original: re zhig gang dang gang zhig khyed cag sa bdag rnams lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams sems can gyi don du 'dir dkyil 'khor rtsom gyis myur ba kho nar song shig / h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: re zhig gang dang gang zhig khyed cag sa bdag rnams lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams sems can gyi don du 'dir dkyil 'khor rtsom gyis myur ba kho nar song shig / h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: Hum phat phat phat svaha. This is the mantra and mudra for expelling obstructors.

original: de nas sgeg mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings nas /
analyzed: de nas sgeg mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings nas /
translated: Then, binding the mudra of the goddess of charm,

original: aom pra s'a dha ku ru mang me ti sun dh'a r'i da ya tsi ta tam h'um dz'um dz'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pra s'a dha ku ru mang me ti sun dh'a r'i da ya tsi ta tam h'um dz'um dz'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Om prasadha kuru mangalameti sunderi dayacitta tam hum jhum jhum svaha.

original: de ni sa'i lha mo la gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de ni sa'i lha mo la gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mantra and mudra for supplicating the goddess of the ground.

original: de'i 'og tu rdo rje de bzhin nyid kyis gzung /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rdo rje de bzhin nyid kyis gzung /
translated: Then, Hold with the vajra tathata,

original: dril bu chos kyis dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: dril bu chos kyis dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: and ring the bell with the dharma.

original: de nas padma'i dbus na gnas pa'i bum pa ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar ba /üîΩrdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas padma'i dbus na gnas pa'i bum pa ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar ba / rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa dmigs te /

original: 'og tu mchod par bya'o//
analyzed: 'og tu mchod par bya'o//
translated: holding a vajra and a bell, and make offerings below.

original: @17b rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su mdzub mo gnyis brkyang te bkug nas rtse dang rtse mor sbyor te snying gar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: @17b rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su mdzub mo gnyis brkyang te bkug nas rtse dang rtse mor sbyor te snying gar gzhag par bya'o //
